___flip.description: Are the axis values in reverse order?

___unitWrapperAfter.description: Additional string to use after the unit

___unitWrapperBefore.description: Additional string to use before the unit

oneOf.description: One level asymmetrical X error bars

items.description: Multi-level asymmetrical X error bars : [level1, level2, ...]

oneOf.description: One level symmetrical Y error bars

items.description: Multi-level symmetrical Y error bars : [level1, level2, ...]

___lineStyle.description: Styling of the line between the points of the serie. Available only for the line serie

color.description: The color of the line, the scatter points, or the bar

lineStyle.description: Some parameter describing further styling of the line

lineWidth.description: If the serie is a line, its width. Otherwise, ignored

___xAxis.description: Index of the x axis in the axis array

___zAxis.description: Index of the z axis in the axis array

___boxes.description: Array of information for box plot

___info.description: Additional information about the data points

___style.description: Styling of each point of the serie

shape.description: Shape of the point (square, round, cross, ...)

lineColor.description: Color of the line defining the shape

zoom.description: Defines the size of the point

lineWidth.description: Width of the line defining the shape

points.description: Points for which this style is valid

oneOf.description: One level symmetrical X error bars

items.description: Multi-level symmetrical X error bars : [level1, level2, ...]

oneOf.description: One level asymmetrical Y error bars

oneOf.description: One level asymmetrical Y error bars

___yAxis.description: Index of the y axis in the axis array
